attributes.action: Make it illegal for shops to have lights on outside trading hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel shops and businesses should be made to turn their lights off outside trading hours as no-one can buy anything and it just wastes pointless electricity. As global warming takes its toll this is something businesses can easily do to prevent needless emissions. They could turn their PCs off as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
